name: Mixcraft 9 Project
summary: An MX9 file is an audio project created by Acoustica Mixcraft 9, a digital audio workstation available for Windows. It contains one or more audio tracks that have been edited and assembled into a song. It may also contain video, if the project is a music video project.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: MX9 file open in Acoustica Mixcraft 9
